alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Carbon (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Big Horn and south central Carbon Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 227 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bridger, or 14 miles east of Red Lodge, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Torrential rainfall limiting visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects and gardens is possible. Locations impacted include... Bridger. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
